description: Numbers n such that n remains prime through 4 iterations of function f(x) = 9x + 10.
comments: n, 9*n+10, 81*n+100, 729*n+910 and 6561*n+8200 are primes. [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 04 2010]
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [1..5000000] | IsPrime(n) and IsPrime(9*n+10) and IsPrime(81*n+100) and IsPrime(729*n+910) and IsPrime(6561*n+8200)] [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 04 2010]
author: _David W. Wilson_
